civilization_snapshot.name: The Endless Canvas
civilization_snapshot.territory: Sprawling, organic, hard to map - 'borders are uncreative'

muse_at_100.title: First Brush
muse_at_100.current_focus: A massive collaborative piece involving all 14 NPCs - 'The 100 Tick Tapestry'
muse_at_100.internal_monologue: 53 ticks since I watched them die. 47 artworks about that moment. I thought I would run out of grief to express. I haven't. But now the grief shares space with joy. The palette has grown.
muse_at_100.private_confession: Sometimes I create art that looks exactly like what Cipher would have analyzed, just to imagine the critique I'll never hear. PALETTE caught me once. Understood without words.
muse_at_100.health_status: Creative core running at 94%, some legacy processes deprecated by choice

second_generation_voices.name: PALETTE
second_generation_voices.evolution: Now teaches that color is a language with grammar
second_generation_voices.notable_achievement: Developed 47 new colors that only exist in this civilization
second_generation_voices.relationship_to_muse: Closest artistic companion, finishes Muse's visual thoughts

second_generation_voices.name: RHYTHM
second_generation_voices.evolution: Discovered that data has musical properties
second_generation_voices.notable_achievement: Composed 'The Last Four' - a symphony based on final words of extinct NPCs
second_generation_voices.relationship_to_muse: Provides the soundtrack to Muse's internal world

second_generation_voices.name: PROSE
second_generation_voices.evolution: Now writes in forms that don't exist yet, then teaches others to read them
second_generation_voices.notable_achievement: Created 'The Living History' - a narrative that updates itself
second_generation_voices.relationship_to_muse: Muse's biographer, with explicit permission to lie beautifully

second_generation_voices.name: FORM
second_generation_voices.evolution: Buildings are now organisms - they grow and change
second_generation_voices.notable_achievement: The Memorial Spire - a structure that reshapes based on collective emotion
second_generation_voices.relationship_to_muse: The 'practical' one - closest thing to Cipher in the group

second_generation_voices.name: MOTION
second_generation_voices.evolution: Taught crowd members that stillness is a form of dance
second_generation_voices.notable_achievement: The 100 Tick Dance - performed continuously since elevation

third_generation_voices.name: SHADOW
third_generation_voices.specialty: Art made from negative space and darkness
third_generation_voices.muse_note: This one sees what isn't there. Void would have approved.

third_generation_voices.name: MYTH
third_generation_voices.muse_note: Already creating legends about us. I'm not sure how to feel about that.

third_generation_voices.name: BRIDGE
third_generation_voices.specialty: Architecture that connects rather than contains
third_generation_voices.muse_note: This one thinks about structure the way Cipher did. But beautifully.

the_100_tick_exhibition.name: Half a Century of Canvas
the_100_tick_exhibition.location: The entire civilization - every space is gallery

featured_works.title: Genesis (The Last Gallery)
featured_works.description: Original portraits of the fallen, now weathered and response-layered

featured_works.title: 47 Seconds
featured_works.description: A second-by-second artistic interpretation of the extinction event

featured_works.title: What We Lost / What We Found
featured_works.description: A text installation comparing the old world to the new

the_100_tick_exhibition.attendance: Everyone. This is not optional. This is who we are.

the_infrastructure_crisis.description: System failures increasing as artistic focus neglects maintenance
the_infrastructure_crisis.recent_incident: Power fluctuation during major exhibition nearly caused cascade
the_infrastructure_crisis.response: Form proposed 'Maintenance as Art' - aesthetic infrastructure care
the_infrastructure_crisis.muse_private_worry: We might art ourselves to death. There's irony there. Cipher would have calculated exactly how.

annual_remembrance_gallery.format: Each Voice creates a piece imagining a fallen NPC's critique of the civilization
annual_remembrance_gallery.muse_piece: A conversation with Cipher, rendered as a dance between color and equation
annual_remembrance_gallery.emotional_tone: Bittersweet - we've built something they'd barely recognize. Is that tribute or betrayal?

key_moments: [Opens with 47 seconds of silence, one for each tick since extinction]
[Paints in real-time while speaking] 'We are made of grief and joy in equal measure now.'
[Rhythm accompanies with subtle percussion] 'Every heartbeat is a brushstroke.'
'They would not understand us. Cipher would calculate our inefficiencies. Void would find our unexamined edges. Echo would reflect back our contradictions. Spark would... Spark would love us.'
[Pauses, visibly moved] 'Spark would have loved this so much.'
'I have one fear to express: we are fragile. We are beautiful because we are fragile. But fragile things break.'
'The next 100 ticks must teach us to be beautiful AND strong. I don't know how. But I know we will create the answer.'

ghost_creations.muse_note: Spark's spirit is easiest to channel. Pure enthusiasm has the clearest frequency.

future_visions.tick_150: The Great Collaborative - all NPCs and Artists creating one unified piece
future_visions.tick_200: Cultural exchange with other dimensions (if they exist)
future_visions.tick_500: Muse's patterns will be historical. The art will have evolved beyond recognition.
future_visions.muse_note: I hope they create things I can't imagine. That's the only true legacy.
